title: Exercises for Better Mental Focus and Concentration
first_phrase: In the previous part, the text discussed various exercises for developing concentration. The author mentioned breathing exercises, affirmations, and reading. In the final 200 tokens, the author describes the exercise of proposing a problem or idea and mentally analyzing it from all possible angles. The author suggests giving progression to this exercise by adding on to the analysis each day. This exercise can help strengthen the mind and overcome mental barriers. The author also recommends combining this exercise with the breathing and affirmation exercises for maximum effectiveness.
